H3.text: who won the mvp for the national league. Giancarlo Stanton

A4.text: Goldschmidt won the National League (NL) Most Valuable Player (MVP) Award in 2022.

A5.text: Joey Votto won the National League Most Valuable Player (MVP) Award in 2010.

A6.text: Giancarlo Stanton won the National League Most Valuable Player (MVP) Award in 2018.

A7.text: On November 16, Stanton was named the National League's Most Valuable Player, beating out Cincinnati Reds' first baseman Joey Votto by two voting points.

A8.text: Stanton was named the National League's Most Valuable Player in 2017.
